attributes.additional_details:
We call for a full investigation into MP Oliver Letwin and the manner in which he disposed of confidential material into a bin in a public place.

The manner of disposal has been a breach of confidentiality of constituents private details and the details of others, this act could, at least represent a breach of the data protection act.

We call on the PM, to conduct a full investigation into this matter as the trust of confidentiality has now been breached.
